Trade/Device Name(s): ARIES Group A Strep Assay Protocol File Kit
Specimen Container(s): Liquid Amies transport system (Nylon Flocked Swab with 1 mL modified Liquid Amies, ESwab)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Luminex ARIES Group A Strep Assay using real-time PCR for direct detection of Streptococcus pyogenes in throat swabs.
Indications for Use Summary: A real-time PCR-based qualitative in vitro diagnostic test for direct detection of Streptococcus pyogenes (Group A beta-hemolytic Streptococcus) in throat swab specimens from patients with signs and symptoms of pharyngitis; aids in the diagnosis of Group A Streptococcal pharyngitis.
